objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#1a1a1a'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#2c2c2c'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='bg2' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#222222'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#333333'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='gold' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#d4af37'/><stop offset='50%' stop-color='#f2d265'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#d4af37'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg1)'/><path d='M0 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 Z' fill='url(#bg2)'/><path d='M0 0 L1080 0 L540 540 Z' fill='#000000' opacity='0.3'/><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='1080' y2='1080' stroke='url(#gold)' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.7'/><line x1='200' y1='0' x2='1080' y2='880' stroke='#d4af37' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/><line x1='0' y1='200' x2='880' y2='1080' stroke='#d4af37' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' stroke='#d4af37' stroke-width='1' fill='none' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='200' stroke='#d4af37' stroke-width='1' fill='none' opacity='0.1'/></svg>

objects.text:
Japanese Quartz Movement
Stainless Steel Design
3ATM Waterproof
Business Style Watch

product_details.description: ⌚Movement: Japanese imported quartz analog movement and battery, provide precise time and long-term running. The watch can be used for more than 1 years. ⌚Material: The strap is made of stainless steel, comfortable and soft and breathable. Mineral glasses, 304 steel case, Suit for all kinds of occasions. ⌚Sports chronograph: Multifunctional sub-dial can work, chronograph, calendar, run seconds. Provide you with multi-function purpose use. ⌚3ATM waterproof: This watch is waterproof 30m, can withstand daily splash or short immersion in water, but not swimming and showering, diving or snorkeling. ☎After sales service: Each product has 1-year after sales service. If you have any questions about the product, please contact me immediately and we will give you a satisfactory solution. Item width - 4.2 centimeters ** Clasp type - Push Button Foldover Clasp With Safety ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
The banner showcases a sophisticated and modern layout designed to promote a luxury watch. The background features dark gradient tones with diagonal geometric patterns and subtle intersecting gold lines, contributing to an elegant and tech-inspired look. The main visual focus lies on a glossy black watch image on the right. 

Text layers include a bold headline ("heading_1" and "heading_2") in contrasting gold and white, a subheadline ("subheading") in gold, a product description ("description") with key features formatted in neat white bullets, and a prominent white price tag ("price"). A yellow rectangular CTA button ("cta_background") with black text ("cta") is placed at the bottom left. One decorative gold line ("decorative_line") enhances visual hierarchy.

**Color Palette:**
- Gold: #d4af37
- Light Gold: #f2d265
- White: #ffffff
- Black: #000000
- Dark Gray Gradient: #1a1a1a → #2c2c2c
product_color: The product image showcases a luxury chronograph watch with a refined monochromatic palette. Dominated by shades of black and gunmetal gray, the polished metallic finish gives an impression of sophistication and durability. The dial employs gradient blending between dark charcoal (#1A1A1A) and brushed steel (#555555), offering a tasteful contrast. Indexes and sub-dials are highlighted through subtle metallic sheens, enhancing visibility and depth. The band’s black chrome (#2C2C2C) tone continues the bold aesthetic. For the advertisement banner, a palette of rich black (#000000), graphite gray (#3C3C3C), and cool silver (#C0C0C0) can be used for elegance and modern appeal.
